bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXIII (Nos 4352-4400)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIII, 4352-4400. - Documents of the Byzantine Period [including hexameter verses (4352) which allude to Diocletian and his first prefect of Egypt, Aurelius Diogenes].
bibl.seg: REA J.R., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXIII (Nos 4352-4400). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 83.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1996, 8°, x-214 pp., 1 fig. et XI pll. dépl. ISBN 0-85698-128-1. £60.
P. Oxy. LXIII, 4352-4400. - Documents of the Byzantine Period [including hexameter verses (4352) which allude to Diocletian and his first prefect of Egypt, Aurelius Diogenes].

C.R. par Roger S. Bagnall, CR N.S., 48 (1998) pp. 149-153 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXII.] - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 147, pp. 173-177. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 48 (1998) pp. 179-181 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXIV].
